sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import PlaceOrderAxios from "./PlaceOrderAxios"; import PayAxios from "./PayAxios"; const Checkout = () => { const state = useSelector((state) => (state.allItem)[0]); let total = 0.0; console.log(state) const itemList = (item) => { total = total + item.price*item.quantity; return (
  • {item.productName}
    ₹{item.price} {' '}X{item.quantity}
    • ); }; const PlaceOrderPay = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); let credit=document.getElementById("credit").checked; let debit=document.getElementById("debit").checked; let paypal=document.getElementById("paypal").checked; console.log("credit ",credit); console.log("debit ",debit); console.log("paypal ",paypal); let mode; if(credit==true) mode="Credit card" else if(debit==true) mode="Debit card" else if(paypal==true) mode="Paypal" PlaceOrderAxios.PlaceOrderAxios("http://localhost:8084/order-service/Order/PlaceOrder/"+mode).then((value)=>{ console.log("ORDER PLACED : ",value) PayAxios.PayAxios("http://localhost:8084/payment-gateway-service/Payment/pay").then((res) => { console.log("oooooooooooooo",res) window.open(res) }) }) } return ( <>

    Your cart {state.length}

      {state.map(itemList)}
    • Total (INR) ₹{total}

    Billing address

    Valid first name is required.
    Valid last name is required.
    @
    Your username is required.
    Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
    Please enter your shipping address.
    Please select a valid country.
    Please provide a valid state.
    Zip code required.

    Payment

    Full name as displayed on card
    Name on card is required
    Credit card number is required
    Expiration date required
    Security code required
     ); }; export default Checkout;
